asSignalWidth.circuit: module main(in a(4)) wire local_1(4) local_1 += #a

asLoopVariable.circuit: module main() wire local_1(4) for $i = 0 to 2 do local_1 += $i

asSimpleExpression.circuit: module main(in a(4)) wire local_1(4) local_1(4) += (#a - 2)

asExpressionWithLhsBeingNested.circuit: module main(in a(4)) wire local_1(4) local_1(4) += (((#a - 2) * 2) - 2)

asExpressionWithRhsBeingNested.circuit: module main(in a(4)) wire local_1(4) local_1(4) += (2 - (((#a - 4) * 2) + #a))
